casebody.data:
NATIONAL LAWYERS GUILD, San Francisco Bay Area Chapter
v.
CITY OF HAYWARD S252445 Supreme Court of California. DECEMBER 19, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. The request for an order directing depublication of the opinion is denied.
